thread.title: GPL 2024/25: Heart of Lions beat Young Apostles to go three points clear
thread.title_full: GPL 2024/25: Heart of Lions beat Young Apostles to go three points clear

author: @Kweku_Lawrence
title: GPL 2024/25: Heart of Lions beat Young Apostles to go three points clear
text:
Heart of Lions have moved three points clear at the top of the Ghana Premier League table with a slim win over Young Apostles.
The Kpando-based side claimed a 1-0 home win over Young Apostles on match day 15.
Kwesi Pong scored the only goal of the game in the second half to ensure Lions kept their position at the top of the league table.
Young Apostles came into the game on the back of three winless games and were hoping to turn their fortunes around.
However, they were denied a win with Lions condemning them to yet another defeat, their seventh of the season.
The two teams enjoyed a bright start to the game but it was the home side who threatened for the majority of the game.
The two teams went into the break with nothing to separate them.
The second half of the encounter was almost a similar story to that of the opening 45 minutes.
When the game seemed to be heading for a draw, Lions found the breakthrough.
Pong found an opening and ensured his strike beat the Young Apostles goalkeeper, handing Lions a late win.
The wins means Bashir Hayfordâ€™s men, with a game more than Bibiani GoldStars, take a three point lead.
